text: Rachel Hunter (born 8 September 1969) is a fashion model and an actress from New Zealand. She worked in France, Australia, UK (London) and New Zealand. in She currently lives in the United States. She has been in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition many times and has posed for other magazines. Hunter posed Playboy in 2004. She was married to singer Rod Stewart from 1990 until 2006. == References == Category:New Zealand television actors Category:Models (profession) Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Rachel Hunter
